name: Offroad Camper Truck Simulator
description:
It's the ultimate offroad driving experience! The off road challenges awaiting, inspired by the stunt driving and camper truck parking around city campsites. Immerse yourself into the greatest summertime adventure and prepare your rv caravan for long term weekend ride, this time off the roads. Choose your summer camper van and drive it through a rugged terrain on a secluded hilly island.

Longing is over! Camper van truck simulator is here with the new version! Get ready for a renegade riding adventure off the roads. Remember smooth city roads? Well those don’t exist anymore! Experience the thrill of driving camping cars along with american truck and offroad jeeps in a wild, roadless environment. Select your favorite car, attach with camper trailer and get lost in extremely offroading adventures. Drive minibuses, offroad jeeps & camper trailers through curvy roads and cross river bridge suspension. Climb highest mountains, race along the death defying narrow rocky ridge, overcome tricky mud and avoid getting stuck in a narrow trench. Explore hazardous hilly roads and dangerous mountains to complete offroad parking missions.

Key Features:
Spectacular gameplay in camping car trailer parking missions
Drive cruiser jeep, RV caravan, camper truck
Detailed trailer models with real time physics
Realistic offroad terrain on hill top outskirts
Advanced turbo engine designed for trailer vehicles
Realistic 3D graphics with amazing sound effects

Enjoy the unique gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases.
